title: Witkiewicz: Seven Plays
description: One of Poland’s most important artists and writers of the 20th Century, this collection The Pragmatists , Tumor Brainiowicz , Gyubal Wahazar , The Anonymous Work , The Cuttlefish , Dainty Shapes and Hairy Apes , and The Beelzebub Sonata . Also included is “A Few Words about the Role of the Actor in the Theatre of Pure Form,” a key section of his major theoretical treatise.
author: Stanisław Ignacy Witkiewicz
